General.Name: Greenpanel Industries Limited
General.Description: Greenpanel Industries Limited engages in the manufacturing and sale of plywood, medium density fibre board (MDF), and allied products in India and internationally. The company provides pre-laminated MDFs, fire retardant MDF panels, interior and exterior grade MDF, plywood and blockboard furniture, wood floors, decorative veneers, and decorative and commercial doors. It also markets MDF and allied products. Greenpanel Industries Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Kolkata, India.
